Constructor Detail

ScreenManager

public ScreenManager(int xRes,
                     int yRes)
Constructor for the ScreenManager class. It creates a new screen with the resolution that the user passes in.

Parameters:
xRes - the horizontal resolution of the screen.
yRes - the vertical resolution of the screen.
Method Detail

clearScreen

public void clearScreen()
Clears the screen if the number of pixels on the screen is greater than 2 million. Otherwise, print out an error message.
